title: Reflections on the Elusive I - The Cognitive Science Show
description:
Layman Pascal and Bruce Alderman released a powerful video in which they reflected on the Elusive I series.  Here is the link to The Elusive I series https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLND1JCRq8VuhZf_MpIeFKO9jp1xF5vCuC

Here is the link to their video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CR5yIz9GkZM

Here are some people mentioned in this video: 

William Desmond
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Desmond_(philosopher)

William Desmond (Being and the Between)
https://www.amazon.com/Being-Between-Philosophy-William-Desmond/dp/0791422720

Bruno Latour (An Inquiry into Modes of Existence)
http://modesofexistence.org/

Jeffery Martin
https://psycnet.apa.org/fulltext/2021-81896-001.html

Peter Fenner
https://www.peterfenner.com/
